collaboration.title: What Does Our Collaboration Look Like?
collaboration.seeSteps: See the Steps of Working with Me

step1.title: Consultation and Needs Analysis
step1.description: At the start of our collaboration, I conduct a detailed consultation to understand your needs and business goals. As a web creator, I analyze the market, your competitors and target audience to deliver the best‑fitting solutions.

step2.title: Design and Website Development
step2.description: Next, I move on to designing the website. I create unique designs that are both aesthetic and functional. I use the latest technologies to ensure your site is modern and responsive. Every website I build is optimized for SEO to increase its visibility in search results.

step3.title: Testing and Deployment
step3.description: Before launch, I thoroughly test functionality across devices and browsers. I make sure everything works flawlessly, then deploy the site to hosting, taking care of every detail.

step4.title: Local SEO
step4.description: I offer professional optimization of your Google Business Profile to help your company stand out in local search results. With an optimized profile, you’ll improve your visibility on Google Maps and Search, attract more customers and increase website traffic.

step5.title: Training and Support
step5.description: After launch, I provide training on site management and content updates. I also offer ongoing technical support and am available to answer questions and help develop the site and marketing activities further.
